product.name: Squelp
product.description: "A Squelp a Day Keeps the Slarkeestas at Bay" -Ancient Junglovian Proverb *The Cosmic Bodega will not be held responsible for any Slarkeesta related injuries or deaths related to the sale of our squelps.

product.name: Gadoobagorp
product.description: The gadoobagorp's shell is harder than lemerian alloy steel, but the juicy flesh and intoxicating juices inside have supposedly lead to massive innovations in the metallurgy sector.

product.name: Gorgaricus
product.description: Just smelling the gorgaricus causes one to experience a deeply unsettling feeling of existential dread. Needless to say, it tastes better than it smells.

product.name: Tribbles
product.description: We're not even sure that tribbles are edible, but we welcome you to try. Godspeed moonman.

product.name: Cantaloupe
product.description: Guys listen, this is the sweatiest melon you've ever seen.

product.name: Alien
product.description: There are ethical implications here, but we'd rather not delve too deep into this stuff. We're just a grocery store.

product.name: Ka'urian flour
product.description: Delightful flour hailing from Ka'urian lands. Rich and nutritious.

product.name: Steamed Lurqun Noodles
product.description: Delicious and exotic. These traditional Lurqun noodles are a great side for any dish.

product.name: Molzala Powder
product.description: A spoonful is all you need to spice up your life.

product.name: Frigganoli zygote
product.description: Fertilzed egg cell from the Frigganoli creature native to planet LIUQ 3Z8.

product.name: Unknown creature egg
product.description: Unknown creature egg picked up along the way by our space travelling providers.

product.name: Stratmos cheese
product.description: Cheese made from Stratmos milk. Aged 3 light years.

product.name: Dragniwazon milk
product.description: Dragniwazon milk. Commonly consumed in Igregon planet for it's impressive health properties. 435 ml.

product.name: Milky Way
product.description: A taste of the cosmos. 354 ml.

product.name: Wheel of moon cheese
product.description: Moon Lilles L9AH delicacy. 45 cm in diameter. 54 lbs.

product.name: Alloy Drum
product.description: Alloy Drum® non-alcoholic beer is imported from Venus, Jupiter and Cedna. This full bodied crisp beer starts with a gentle maltiness and clean finish.

product.name: Hexenon
product.description: Fill up on vitamin C with this refreshing hexenon juice without pulp, not from concentrate and 100% pure.

product.name: Nitain Extract
product.description: Enjoy the clear lemon-lime refreshment of Nitrain Extract® with its crisp, clean, great taste. It is made with 100% natural flavours, and has no colour and no caffeine. Perfect size to be enjoyed with meals, snacks or on the go.

product.name: Beta Corruptor
product.description: This classic Beta Corruptor® tea is a delicious traditional drink made from black tea. It will give all your mornings the authentic taste of Pluto.

product.name: Pyrus Essence
product.description: Pyrus Essence® is a great tasting sports drink made with natural flavours. Formulated with an exclusive ION4 Advanced Electrolyte System, Pyrus Essence® helps replenish sodium, potassium, calcium and magnesium.

product.name: Sentirum
product.description: Sentirum® brings together rich, soothing flavours like gorgacius, buttery auron, toasted kuva and sweet thaumica balanced by the warm zest of frumble peel and a light, oaky finish.
